description: colorful image of a small town in yellow, gray and brown pigments; railroad tracks and crossing in bottom center; red truck in center; tree with red leaves on a brown mound on left side of image; groups of buildings on right and in URQ; seascape in top center
inscription: LLC, in margin, in pencil: \"Waterwich Crossing 9/10
provenance: (Hirschl & Adler, New York). (William Greenbaum, Rockport, Mass., until 2018; sold to Kinney); Marla J. Kinney, Minneapolis (2018-19)
signed: LRC, in margin, in pencil: Helfond
title: Waterwitch Crossing
